ygData.subject: RE: Yellow?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: Bunch of my friends went a couple nights ago, warrior who is our guild leader got the BladeStorm off the dracoliche.  i think another guild on some other
ygData.messageBody:
Bunch of my friends went a couple nights ago, warrior who is our guild
leader got the BladeStorm off the dracoliche. i think another guild on some
other server got this same sword off CazicThule himself. ranger got thorny
arms and bracer, warrior got russet arms, cleric got the pruple boots,
enchanter got that sand-colored robe with the eyes on it. good night, i
missed it was asleep, luckily no bard items were found. i think i am at
work and as i type this my wife is playing and in fear, told me they got a
cryosilk cap for a wizard. i really don't want to be at work right now =(

Shada

>
> We didnt get any bracers, just arms. My friend tinen (lvl 41
> bard) got the
> arms since we where randoming everything that was obtained between the
> classes that could use them. Me and tinen nearly fell over
> laughing when we
> found the first bard only item since we where the only 2
> bards. But alas,
> he got the first item, and we didnt find anymore for the
> night since we
> gated out shortly after that. All of this was on the first
> day, before they
> made it supposedly harder.
